My hornet-hunter hamburger chased pests.
The fly-fighter fry swatted away.
A mosquito-masher muffin slapped hard.
The spider-spinner soup made webs.
My tarantula-tamer toast wasn't scared.
The scorpion-stalker steak watched tail.
A centipede-counter cookie counted legs.
The millipede-marcher mango walked long.
My pillbug-poker pizza made roll.
The earthworm-explorer egg dug tunnels.
A leech-leader lasagna led swamp.
The tick-tracker toast found hosts.
My flea-fighter fry jumped high.
The louse-looker lemon searched heads.
A mite-manager muffin organized tiny.
